help.title: Quick Poll
help.text: One Poll to rule them all, one Poll to find them, one Poll to bring them all and in the darkness bind them.

help.title: Remove a Warning
help.text: Remove the last warning given to a specified member.

help.title: Warning Report
help.text: Show a count of warnings issued to all users over a period of days before today's date. Optionally specify a channel and/or days. Default is current channel and 30 days.

help.title: Warning Report Detailed
help.text: Show a detailed report of warnings issued to a specified user over a period of days before today's date (default is last 30 days).

help.title: Clear Warnings
help.text: Remove all warnings from a user in a channel.

queries.GET_WARNINGS_DAYS: SELECT * FROM `warnings` WHERE `discordId` = ? AND `guild` = ? AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),`issued`) <= ?
queries.GET_WARNINGS_BY_REASON_DAYS: SELECT * FROM `warnings` WHERE `discordId` = ? AND `channel` = ? AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),`issued`) <= ?
queries.GET_WARNINGS_DETAILED: SELECT * FROM `warnings` WHERE `discordId` = ? AND `channel` = ? AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),`issued`) <= ?
queries.GET_WARNINGS_DETAILED_BY_NAME: SELECT * FROM `warnings` WHERE LOWER(`discordName`) LIKE LOWER(?) AND `channel` = ? AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),`issued`) <= ?
queries.DEL_WARNING_BY_ID: DELETE FROM `warnings` WHERE `discordId` = ? AND `channel` = ? ORDER BY `issued` DESC LIMIT ?
queries.GET_USER_BY_NAME: SELECT * FROM `warnings` WHERE LOWER(`discordName`) LIKE LOWER(?) AND `guild` = ?
queries.GET_USER_AWAY_DATE: SELECT * FROM `awaylog` WHERE `discordId` = ? AND `guild` = ? AND `channel` = ? AND `startDate` BETWEEN ? AND ?;
